name: [PROTOTYPE] between realities
description:
Hi, I'm Eva. This is a small prototype of the mechanics of changing realities - from an everyday room to a medieval one.

This mechanic was inspired by Fran Bow and I wanted to try something that was not scary.

In mechanics, there are only two working buttons located at the bottom left corner.

To switch reality, simply click on the big pebble and it will switch from red to yellow or vice versa.

Also, in each reality, you can turn on and off the light. To do this, click on the small button.

I almost completely rendered the rooms and the interface myself, and it was such a cool experience! You can watch a video about it by turning on the subtitles.

You can download the mechanics file for Construct 2 below by clicking on the button. This is a .capx file so make sure you have Construct 2 and it's version r279 or higher before applying.

Also, you can download a .png file (transparent background) with furniture from this project or full .zip file.

I can be contacted here:

https://t.me/GameSunlight
https://vk.com/kheylady
